products.title: Pot Plants Greenhouse Curtain
products.description: Incorporate the fresh greenery of their pot plants greenhouse roman blind into your home, it is boasting with your favourite house plants printed onto a soft white cotton background this quirky and characterful blind will pack fun into everywhere from kitchens to garden rooms, we only select what we know you will love and this pattern from the prestigious pick n mix collection will keep the mood light with the bright and playful motif.

products.description: Complement your design scheme with the warm earthy tones of the galaxy plantation green curtain. products.title: Deer Lichen Green Curtain

The forest green colour will blend effortlessly with greys and darker shade rooms and will give you the perfect country luxe feeling all year round. Echoing wooded glades this cotton fabric from the prestigious nature collection draws an illustration of shy wildlife in fine pencilled detail.
